entads.name: Heirloom Shocksword
entads.power: It’s electric. It's very mildly shocks anything which touches the blade, and a magical charge can be expended to create a stronger burst of electricity.

entads.name: Stride Boots
entads.power: They make the wearer's stride slightly longer, enabling slightly faster walking.

bound.name: Record Book
bound.looks: a small book
bound.power: The book transcribes everything people say nearby.

bound.name: Bookpack
bound.looks: a book, big and thick, nearly a foot and a half tall, with what had to be more than a thousand pages
bound.power: Each page is capable of storing a small item. Press the item into the page to store it as a drawing, annoted with a description of the item.

bound.name: Finger Flute
bound.looks: a flute with what seemed like far too many holes
bound.power: When in contact with a person's skin, that person has as many fingers as they need, and has the muscle memory needed to use all of their fingers effectively.

bound.name: Anyspoon
bound.looks: a small silver spoon
bound.power: With concentration, the wielder can change its shape and size, but it can never shift too far from being a normal spoon.

bound.name: Trauma Hanky
bound.looks: a dark red handkerchief
bound.power: unbound
bound.bound: While it covers a wound, that wound temporarily ceases to cause pain or impairment.

bound.name: Slow Bow
bound.looks: a white wooden longbow the color of bone
bound.power: Shooting an arrow creates a 10 foot bubble of slowed time that follows the arrow.

bound.name: Mergan's Monocle
bound.looks: a monocle with a green lens
bound.power: It allows the wearer to read other languages.

bound.name: Mergan's Lockbox
bound.power: The entad takes some time and effort to open. It is used as a safe.

bound.name: Self-fetching Arrows
bound.looks: a set of arrows made of near-indestructable metal, slightly blunt
bound.power: After coming to a rest for one second, the arrows return to the person who shot them. This effect fails is more than four arrows are loosed at the same time.

bound.name: Dagger of Strategic Retreating
bound.looks: a small dagger, slightly dull, with a handle of jade
bound.power: Once per day, the person whom the dagger last cut can teleport to the location of the dagger. Anything the person is carrying is teleported along with them, up to some weight limit.

bound.name: Woods Walker
bound.looks: a staff
bound.power: It lets you walk through trees about a mile at a time but in a random direction.

bound.name: Doldrum Insurance
bound.looks: a sail
bound.power: Harnesses unseen winds.

bound.name: One-Way Ticket to Sprained Anklesville
bound.looks: a pair of boots
bound.power: The wearer can jump fifty feet.

bound.name: Hearing Earings
bound.looks: a pair of earrings, jet black in the center with silver swirls around the outside
bound.power: slightly improved, omnidirectional hearing

bound.name: Jingu Bang Junior
bound.looks: a wooden staff, so natural that it might have been possible to mistake for a branch
bound.power: The staff can change in length, and it ehances the wielder's balance.

bound.name: Soggy Sword
bound.looks: a sword covered in seaweed, rust, and barnacles, with the metal chipped and cracked
bound.power: The sword is constantly damp, and it lets the wielder breathe underwater.

bound.name: Warping Wardrobe
bound.looks: a piece of large oak furniture with a curious dial set into its front
bound.power: After the dial is set, the interior of the wardrobe opens a one-way portal to an adjacent hex.
bound.owner: The Party, though kept in the Pucklechurch.

bound.name: Fidget Flipper
bound.looks: a big coin, almost a big across as a hand
bound.power: It's fun to flip.

bound.name: Slipknot
bound.looks: a rope
bound.power: The rope slides in place with the ends moving.

bound.name: Clerical X-Ray Specs
bound.looks: a pair of goggles
bound.power: Let's the wearer see inside of people, and highlights the parts of their body that have been magicically changed.

bound.name: Rock Garden
bound.looks: a pale rock with lots of holes
bound.power: It allows access to an extra-dimensional space which can be used to store organic material and stone.

bound.name: Backstabber
bound.power: It lets you know how aware of you someone is.

bound.name: The Flower Pot
bound.looks: an ordinary flower pot
bound.power: When the bottom is tapped twice, it lets out a beam of concentrated light that can blast halfway through a city.

bound.name: The Warp Wand
bound.looks: a rod
bound.power: It allows whoever holds it to teleport anywhere they can think of as often as they please.

bound.name: Recall Statue
bound.looks: a statue
bound.power: Alfric's mom can teleport to it from anywhere in the world.

bound.name: Pond Hopper
bound.looks: NA
bound.power: Allows the wielder to teleport from one fountain to another.

bound.name: Gillgamesh
bound.power: Gave gills to Alfric's Uncle

bound.name: Topo Table
bound.looks: a table, nearly four feet across, six feet long
bound.power: The surface of the table forms a map of the region, including 3d terrain.

bound.name: Instadinner
bound.looks: a cloche (tableware cover)
bound.power: When the cloche is list, you'll find a hot meal waiting for you.
